title: Top Places to visit in South Sikkim, Namchi, Sikkim
content:
South Sikkim is a district of the Indian state of Sikkim. Its capital is Namchi.
Namchi or Namtse is the capital of the district of South Sikkim in the Indian state of Sikkim. The appellation Namchi means Sky (Nam) High (Chi) in Sikkimese.

title: Top Places to visit in North Sikkim, Mangan, Sikkim
content:
North Sikkim is a district of the Indian state of Sikkim. Its district headquarters is Mangan. It is the seventh least populous district in the country (out of 640).
As of 2013, C P Dhakal is the district Collector of the district.
Mangan is the capital of the district of North Si

title: Top Places to visit in East Sikkim, Gangtok, Sikkim
content:
East Sikkim is one of the four administrative districts of the Indian state of Sikkim. Geographically, East Sikkim occupies the south-east corner of the state. The capital of East Sikkim is Gangtok, which is also the state capital. It is the hub of all administrative activity in the state.

title: Top Places to visit in Udaipur, Rajasthan
content: Udaipur, also known as the "City of Lakes", is a city in the state of Rajasthan in India. It is the historic capital of the kingdom of Mewar in the former Rajputana Agency. title: Top Places to visit in Tonk, Rajasthan
content: Tonk is a town in the Indian state of Rajasthan. The town is situated 95 km (60 mi) by road south from Jaipur, near the right bank of the Banas River. It is the administrative headquarters of Tonk District. Tonk was also the capital of the eponymous princely state of British India from 1817 to 19

title: Top Places to visit in Sirohi, Rajasthan
content: Sirohi is a city in southern Rajasthan state in western India. It is the administrative headquarters of Sirohi District and was formerly the capital of the princely state of Sirohi ruled by Sirohi Rajput rulers. title: Top Places to visit in Sawai Madhopur, Rajasthan
content: Sawai Madhopur is a city and Municipal Corporation (Nagar Parishad) in the Sawai Madhopur District in Rajasthan state, India. It is the administrative headquarters of Sawai Madhopur District of Rajasthan.Sawai Madhopur District comes under Bharatpur Divisional Commissionerate.  Near to Sawai

title: Top Places to visit in Sikar, Rajasthan
content: Sikar is a city located midway between Agra and Bikaner on the National Highway 52 in the state of Rajasthan in India. It is the administrative headquarters of the Sikar District. title: Top Places to visit in Rajsamand, Rajasthan
content:
Rajsamand is a town in Rajasthan, western India. The city is named for Rajsamand Lake, an artificial lake created in the 17th century by Rana Raj Singh of Mewar. It is the administrative headquarters of Rajsamand District.

title: Top Places to visit in Pratapgarh, Rajasthan
content:
Pratapgarh, is a town in Rajasthan, India. It is the district headquarters of Pratapgarh district the newest district of Rajasthan. Famous for its Thewa art, the city is surrounded by tribal villages. It is famous for its edible jiralun and hing.

Top Places to visit in Nagaur, Rajasthan
content:
Nagaur is a city in the state of Rajasthan in India. It is the administrative headquarters of Nagaur District. The Nagaur city lies about midway between Jodhpur and Bikaner.
